content.text: hi, run your think tool, and then write a file into /tmp/poker.md with a random fact about poker.

input.thought: Okay, I will first think, and then create a file named poker.md in the /tmp directory with a random poker fact.

input.file_text: A "poker hand" is a set of five playing cards. The number of distinct five-card hands that can be dealt from a standard 52-card deck is 2,598,960.
